amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into a contract with any person whose disclosures of a proceeding with a disposition listed in section 2313(c)(1) of title 41, United States Code, in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System include the term "Fair Labor Standards Act.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
